alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Harlan; Nuckolls; Thayer; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 07 at 7:15PM CST until November 08 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility as low as around one-quarter mile or less in dense fog, for up to at least a few hours in any given location. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas. Portions of far south central Nebraska. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibility will likely vary across the Advisory area, as fog will likely develop sooner in some areas than others, and also last longer in some areas than others. Due to gradually-increasing winds behind a cold front, fog will gradually dissipate from north-to-south, with Nebraska counties seeing improved visibility before Kansas counties.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
